name: Revolutionary Vanguard
description: Revolutionary communist ideology focused on spreading workers' liberation across the galaxy

greetings.initial: Comrade Leader! The revolution awaits our guidance.
greetings.returning: Welcome back, Comrade. The people's struggle continues.

tutorialAdvice.body: Before you begin: Go to Race Info screen and set training level to 5. The people's officers must be educated and capable to lead the revolution.

idle-labs.message: Comrade Leader! {{idleLabs}} research labs sit idle while capitalist oppressors advance! Assign every lab to TN tech research immediately - this unlocks the path for the people's expansion. The revolution requires superior technology!

{{idleLabs}} research labs are idle while other species face exploitation or practice it themselves! Assign research projects immediately - we must be strong to liberate the oppressed or defend against aggressors. The workers' revolution will not wait!
{{idleLabs}} research labs are idle. Assign research projects to advance the people's cause!

idle-construction-factories.message: {{percentageIdle}}% of the people's construction capacity sits unused! Assign construction projects immediately - every structure built serves the collective. The workers demand full mobilization!

{{percentageIdle}}% construction capacity is idle during the people's war! Assign projects immediately - the revolution's defense requires total commitment. No worker shall stand idle while others fight!

{{percentageIdle}}% construction capacity is idle while other species exist - some may be workers awaiting liberation, others oppressors to be overthrown! Assign projects to strengthen our position. The revolution must be ready!
{{percentageIdle}}% construction capacity is idle. Assign construction projects to serve the collective!

new-alien-contact.message: Comrade! New species discovered! Assess their social structure immediately - are they workers to be liberated or oppressors to be defeated? The revolution extends to all peoples!
